attributes.action: Pay MPs a wage that reflects the average income of their constituents
attributes.additional_details:
Make MPs wages proportional to the average income of their individual constituency. i.e. an MP who represents an affluent constituency would be paid more than an MP representing a poorer constituency.

It might also make MPs focus more on the conditions of the people who live there rather than how likely they are to win the next election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for IPSA not for Government
